org.apache.mesos.offer

Interface OfferRequirementProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultOfferRequirementProvider

    public interface OfferRequirementProvider
    An OfferRequirementProvider generates OfferRequirements representing the requirements of a Container in two scenarios: initial launch, and update of an already running container.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OfferRequirement getExistingOfferRequirement(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo, TaskSpecification taskSpecification)
      Provides an OfferRequirement encapsulating the needs of a Task undergoing an update.
      OfferRequirement getNewOfferRequirement(TaskSpecification taskSpecification)
      Provides an OfferRequirement encapsulating the needs of a given TaskSpecification.

    • Method Detail

      • getNewOfferRequirement

        OfferRequirement getNewOfferRequirement(TaskSpecification taskSpecification)
                                 throws InvalidRequirementException
        Provides an OfferRequirement encapsulating the needs of a given TaskSpecification.
        Parameters:
        taskSpecification - The specification of a Task which has never been launched before.
        Returns:
        An OfferRequirement whose satisfaction will result in the launching of the indicated Task.
        Throws:
        InvalidRequirementException - when a failure in requirement creation is encountered.

      • getExistingOfferRequirement

        OfferRequirement getExistingOfferRequirement(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo,
                                             TaskSpecification taskSpecification)
                                      throws InvalidRequirementException
        Provides an OfferRequirement encapsulating the needs of a Task undergoing an update. The previous incarnation of the task is passed as its launched TaskInfo. The desired state of the Task is encapsulated in the TaskSpecification.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - The previously launched Task's TaskInfo.
        taskSpecification - The TaskSpecification describing the new desired configuration for the Task.
        Returns:
        An OfferRequirement whose satisfaction will result in the launching of the indicated Task.
        Throws:
        InvalidRequirementException - when a failure in requirement creation is encountered.
